sourceDesc.p: Retrieved from Grabber Zone (https://grabber.zone/comics/sonic-idw/2018-2019-neo-metal-sonic-saga/sonic-the-hedgehog-01/), an online Sonic comic collection gathered for educational purposes

p.note: A value of 'NNC' for the cbml:panel element's 'characters' attribute is an acronym standing for No Named Characters, meaning no characters with names appeared in the panel.
A '(?)' within a note with a type value of 'panelDesc' means that the encoding author saw something unidentifiable, or else is unsure of their own identification.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Sonic the Hedgehog has spent years fighting the forces of Dr. Eggman.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic confronts the Egg Viper.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Time and again the mad doctor attacks, Sonic strikes back, then relaxes until Eggman returns.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic fights the Egg Emperor.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: But after their last battle...
cbml:panel.note: Sonic battles the Egg Dragoon.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: ...Dr. Eggman vanished...
cbml:panel.note: Sonic confronts the Death Egg Robot.
Sonic runs in the middle of the page.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: ...but his robot army did not!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Whuh-oh--that doesn't look good.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic sees missiles firing onto a fortress.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Sounds like the locals are putting up a fight. I hope they don't mind me lending a hand!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic starts running to the fortress.
Sonic runs into the fortress.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Run! Get to the storm bunker!
cbml:panel.note: An unnamed wolf-like character directs an unnamed bear-like character and an unnamed birdlike character to seek shelter at a storm bunker as two Egg Pawns chase the animals.
An Egg Pawn approaches the wolf character as the wolf nervously clutches his Blue Cube Wispon.
The Egg Pawn knocks the wolf character to the ground, causing him to collapse and drop his Blue Cube Wispon.
A group of Egg Pawns approach the collapsed wolf character.
Sonic zooms into the Egg Pawns, destroying them as the wolf watches.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hey! You hurt?
N-Not really. You're... You're Sonic!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic asks the wolf if the wolf is hurt, and the wolf feels excited to see Sonic.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You're... the Sonic!
The one and only. Here you go. Try swinging it at the robots next time. I knew somebody who put it to good use.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic suggests to the wolf that the wolf uses the Blue Cube Wispon the next time the Egg Pawns confront the wolf.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Maybe get inside, buddy. Nice chat! Need to save your town. Bye!
O-Okay!
cbml:panel.note: As Sonic runs off to save the wolf's town, Sonic advises the wolf to take shelter.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Sweet! The town militia! Bots coming in from the north! You've got a guy holding his own out there!
O-Okay! We're on it!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic warns the town militia that robots are coming from the north as he speeds past three of the militia's members and tells them that he will protect them.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hurry up! They're closing in!
I'm trying! It's stuck!
cbml:panel.note: Another unnamed catlike character tells a struggling unnamed male birdlike character to open a storm cellar-like door as three Motobugs approach them.
Sonic speeds past the Motobugs and toward the two animal civilians.
Sonic winks and poses in front of the two animal civilians as the Motobugs break.
Sonic speeds past the two animal civilians.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: ...All this terror might be worth it if I get to say Sonic winked at me!
I hope we survive long enough to get his autograph!
cbml:panel.note: The cat and the bird feel happy that Sonic rescued them from the Motobugs.
Sonic tries to attack the Egghammer by spin-dashing into him, but the Egghammer deflects Sonic with the handle of his hammer.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: C'mon, big guy! Swing batta-batta-batta--
cbml:panel.note: Sonic stands on top of a manhole cover, the Egg Hammer behind him

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: --Swing?
cbml:panel.note: Sonic is surprised that he is surrounded by more than one Egghammer.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Yeah, okay, this one's on me.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic blames himself after he is surrounded by four Egghammers.
The four Egghammers pound their hammers onto the floor.
Sonic lifts up a manhole and whistles to grab attention from an Egghammer.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: "Hedgehog." Noun. A burrowing animal.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic comes out of the manhole and tells an Egghammer the definition of the word "hedgehog".

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Whoa! You guys can really move when you want to!
cbml:panel.note: The Egghammers chase down Sonic, and Sonic is surprised that the Egghammers are moving whenever they feel like it.
One of the Egghammers is dropping its hammer down onto Sonic, and Sonic tries to dodge the attack.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Tails!
Could you not risk your life for five minutes?
Sure, but where's the fun in that?
cbml:panel.note: Tails saves Sonic from the Egghammer's swinging attack, warning him not to risk his life for another five minutes. Sonic agrees, but he wonders where the fun would be in the next five minutes.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Seriously though, thanks for the save.
My pleasure!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic thanks Tails for saving him from the Egghammers.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: What's the status of the town?
A bunch of small-fry Badniks. I took care of most of them, and the town's militia can handle the rest.
cbml:panel.note: Tails asks for the status of the town, and Sonic tells him that he defeated most of the Badniks that were attacking the town, and the military will get rid of any remaining Badniks.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Those Super Badniks are another story.
cbml:panel.note: The Egghammers are proceeding across the town, and Sonic tells Tails that the Egghammers are a different problem.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Let's show 'em how it's done!
Those are better left to the professionals!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic and Tails tell each other that they will defeat the Egghammers, and they feel confident about defeating them too.
Sonic and Tails roll off the roof of a building, charging up their spin dashes.
Sonic and Tails spin dash into an Egghammer.
Sonic and Tails destroy the Egghammer by spin-dashing through the Egghammer's armor.
Sonic and Tails land on the ground as the Egghammer gets ripped in half.
Sonic and Tails strike an epic pose as they look at each other. The Egghammer explodes in the background.
Sonic and Tails find another Egghammer, and they chase it down.
While the Egghammer swings its gigantic hammer at Sonic and Tails, Tails takes Sonic into the air, launching another special attack.
Tails throws Sonic into the Egghammer, bending the Egghammer's nose.
Tails whacks the Egghammer's hammer out of its hands, and Sonic takes the Egghammer's nose off of its face.
Sonic proceeds to attack the Egghammer again, this time by spin-dashing into its head.
Sonic and the Egghammer fight each other while Tails watches from above.
Sonic and Tails land the coup-de-grace to the Egghammer, felling it.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: This would be going a lot faster if we had Knuckles with us.
Naaaah, we're doing fine!
cbml:panel.note: Tails wishes that Knuckles the Echidna would help fight the Egghammers with him and Sonic, but Sonic disagrees with Tails and claims that they are okay fighting by themselves.
